alfredsnippet.snippet:
(cont'd)

"... The flaw in this analysis is the assumption that your computer is necessarily powered by a battery. The estimate of a few hours could be wrong if your computer were operated from an electrical power outlet in the wall. The assumption that a battery supplies the power for your computer is analogous to Lord Kelvin's assumption that gravitational energy powers the sun."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Kelvin's Energy Source for the Sun - Part 3
